Test Name: Lyme CNS Infection IgG Antibody Index
Purpose: To measure the IgG antibody index (CSF/serum) for diagnosing Lyme central nervous system infection.
Container: Sterile container for CSF; serum separator tube (SST) or red-top tube for serum
Equipment: Automated or manual ELISA/microplate reader (450 nm) with incubator and plate washer
